text:
Why is uptake of the #vaccine so vital in BAME communities? 

Speaking with our friends at @hfbritain Dr Minil Patel discusses the health, cultural, and socioeconomic reasons why #Covid19 might disproportionately impact BAME communities.

Watch below! 👇👇

#Worldimmunisationweek https://t.co/XboKocsrDD
